title: Bug 12906 - Unable to open file in another editor when already opened in one editor
description: When a file is already opened in one editor, attempting to open the same file in another editor does not produce any warning or error message. However, there should be a warning or error message displayed.
OB: When opening a file in another editor that is already opened in one editor, no warning or error message is displayed.
EB: When opening a file in another editor that is already opened in one editor, there should be a warning or error message displayed.
SR:
1. Open a file in one editor. 
2. Attempt to open the same file in another editor.
3. Verify that a warning or error message is displayed.
